first_reasoning: We recommend allocating the full $10 million to the Consumer Products Division because its stable top-line shows the market’s intact demand, while slipping margins point directly to the need for process and product innovation. This focused, stage-gated approach maximizes the likelihood of measurable earnings improvement within 12–18 months and preserves flexibility to shift funds to the highest-ROI project as results emerge.
